Logo and navigation centered, the logo on top of the navigation.
Logo left-aligned on the same line as navigation.

settings.content: Maximum logo dimensions are 884px wide by 200px high. Your uploaded file will be resized to fit within these constraints. Need a full-width banner? Upload an image with a width of 884px, and a height of 200px or less and select the centered alignment above.

settings.label: Keep main navigation on one line with "More" drop-down menu
settings.info: Disabling this will cause the navigation to wrap to a second or third row on smaller screens

settings.label: Only show products in search results

settings.content: [Where do I get my MailChimp Form Action?](http://support.shopify.com/customer/portal/articles/640278)
Note: The optimal dimensions for your slider images are 884px wide by 490px high.

settings.label: “Notify me when a sold out product becomes available again” form

settings.content: The following allows you to control which collections are featured on the special [/collections](/collections) page. Create a link list under your [Navigation tab](/admin/links) and come back here to select it. That link list will need to contain links to collections.

settings.label: Show shared count
settings.info: Only available for Facebook, Twitter, and Pinterest

settings.label: Shipping Rates Calculator default country selection

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use above, refer to your first checkout page.

settings.label: This collection will be displayed if a customer's cart is empty or a search has yielded no results
